title: Finding the Actual Value When Given the Residual: Boys vs. Girls
question_text:
The least squares regression line for boys and girls in a classroom is given by:
$$\hat { b } = -5.2 + 2.1g$$
...where $b$ is boys and $g$ is girls.
If Mr. Law has $12$ girls in his class and his residual is $3$, how many boys does he have in his class?
